changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO goods (name, surname, price, create_date, expiration_date, is_available) VALUES ('Apple', 'Golden', 1.20, '2024-03-01', '2024-04-01', true), ('Banana', 'Cavendish', 2.30, '2024-03-05', '2024-03-25', true), ('Orange', 'Navel', 1.50, '2024-03-10', '2024-04-10', false), ('Pear', 'Conference', 1.80, '2024-03-15', '2024-04-15', true), ('Mandarin', 'Clementine', 2.00, '2024-03-20', '2024-04-20', false);
